trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: 單一資料表命令，可用來協調所做的變更會自動產生<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>與相關聯的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> associated with the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>協調所做的變更所需的 SQL 陳述式不會自動產生<xref:System.Data.DataSet>與資料來源相關聯。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an OdbcCommandBuilder object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以在其中建立 OdbcCommandBuilder 物件產生<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A><xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>屬性</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>設定為單一資料表更新 SQL 陳述式

trans-unit.source: The OdbcCommandBuilder then generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set.
trans-unit.target: OdbcCommandBuilder 接著會產生您未設定任何其他 SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The relationship between an <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> and its corresponding OdbcCommandBuilder is always one-to-one.
trans-unit.target: 之間的關聯性<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>和其相對應的 OdbcCommandBuilder 一定是一對一。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To create this correspondence, you set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> property of the OdbcCommandBuilder object.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立這種對應關係，您將設定<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>OdbcCommandBuilder 物件的屬性。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: This causes the OdbcCommandBuilder to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that affect the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致登錄它自己做為接聽程式會產生輸出的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating>事件，會影響<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> OdbcCommandBuilder

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the OdbcCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式，使用 OdbcCommandBuilder<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>屬性，以擷取所需的一組中繼資料。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the value of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should then call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更的值<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>中繼資料擷取，例如第一次更新之後，您應該都會接著呼叫之後<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>方法，以更新中繼資料。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the SELECT statement assigned to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property uses aliased column names, the resulting INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements may be inaccurate or fail.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果 SELECT 陳述式指派給<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>屬性使用別名資料行名稱，產生的 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 陳述式可能不正確或失敗。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying ODBC driver cannot provide the appropriate base column name for the alias column name (using the SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME value of `SQLColAttribute`), the alias name could be used in the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式無法提供適當的基底資料行名稱別名資料行名稱 (使用 SQL_DESC_BASE_COLUMN_NAME 值`SQLColAttribute`)，無法產生 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 陳述式中使用的別名名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle returns the alias name as the base column name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft ODBC Driver for Oracle 傳回的別名名稱的基底的資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the generated INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements would cause errors.
trans-unit.target: 因此，產生的 INSERT、 UPDATE 和 DELETE 陳述式會導致錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The OdbcCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也會使用 OdbcCommandBuilder <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Connection%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Transaction%2A>屬性參考<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the value of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property itself is changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>如果修改了一個或多個這些屬性，或如果的值<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>本身的屬性變更。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: 否則<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>屬性會保留其先前的值。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the OdbcCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>，會解除關聯 OdbcCommandBuilder <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>，以及所產生的命令不會再使用。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The base constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 基底建構函式所有的欄位初始化成為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref>類別相關聯<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>自己註冊為接聽程式<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating>產生的事件<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>這個屬性中指定。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>，任何現有<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>與此相關聯<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>釋放。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"> </xref>要產生關聯，與此物件<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object for which this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref> object will generate SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref>物件以及此<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref>物件將會產生 SQL 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>自己註冊為接聽程式<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating>產生的事件<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>這個屬性中指定。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>，任何現有<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>與此相關聯<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>釋放。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter"> </xref>與此相關聯的物件<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取預存程序中指定的參數資訊<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>並於其中填入<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>的指定集合<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters 會覆寫任何現有的參數資訊<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters 需要額外的呼叫到資料來源取得的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果事先已知道參數資訊，則更有效率的明確設定資訊填入參數集合。

trans-unit.source: You can only use DeriveParameters with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters 只可透過預存程序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use DeriveParameters to populate the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用 DeriveParameters 填入<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection>與任意的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，例如參數化的 SELECT 陳述式。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref>參考預存程序的衍生來源的參數資訊。

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的參數加入<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>集合<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The underlying ODBC driver does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, or the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref> specified was not <xref uid="langword_csharp_CommandType.StoredProcedure" name="CommandType.StoredProcedure" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式不支援傳回預存程序參數資訊，或命令文字不是有效的預存程序名稱，或<xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref>指定未<xref uid="langword_csharp_CommandType.StoredProcedure" name="CommandType.StoredProcedure" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行刪除資料來源所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetDeleteCommand 方法資訊或疑難排解用途，因為它會傳回<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 GetDeleteCommand 做為基礎的已修改的命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫 GetDeleteCommand 並修改的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>值，並接著明確設定，於<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，您必須明確呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，GetDeleteCommand 也會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式，當應用程式呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或 GetDeleteCommand。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行刪除所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行刪除資料來源所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>方法資訊或疑難排解的考量，因為它會傳回<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>做為基礎的已修改的命令。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>及修改的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>值，並接著明確設定，於<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，您必須明確呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式，當應用程式呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`true`如`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制執行<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>來產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 符合下列條件時，才會成功:-<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>已指定，且其長度為等於或大於產生的參數名稱。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -產生的參數名稱符合指定準則<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>規則運算式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>指定。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，如果可能的話，產生比對資料行名稱的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，產生@p1， @p2，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行刪除所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行插入資料來源所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetInsertCommand 方法資訊或疑難排解用途，因為它會傳回<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 GetInsertCommand 做為基礎的已修改的命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫 GetInsertCommand 並修改的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>值，並接著明確設定，於<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，您必須明確呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand still will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，GetInsertCommand 仍將使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式，當應用程式呼叫 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或 GetInsertCommand。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行插入所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行插入資料來源所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>方法資訊或疑難排解的考量，因為它會傳回<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>做為基礎的已修改的命令。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>及修改的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>值，並接著明確設定，於<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter>。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, you must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，您必須明確呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式，當應用程式呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`true`如`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制執行<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>來產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified, and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 符合下列條件時，才會成功:-<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>已指定，且其長度為等於或大於產生的參數名稱。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -產生的參數名稱符合指定準則<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>規則運算式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>指定。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，如果可能的話，產生比對資料行名稱的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，產生@p1， @p2，依此類推。

trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>執行插入所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: 提供未加引號識別項在正確的類別目錄的情況下，傳回的正確加上引號識別項的形式。

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 這包括正確逸出識別項中的任何內嵌的引號。

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: 原始的不具引號識別項。

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 引號識別項的版本。

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的引號識別碼內的正確逸出。

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: 提供未加引號識別項在正確的類別目錄的情況下，傳回的正確加上引號識別項的形式。

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 這包括正確逸出識別項中的任何內嵌的引號。

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: 原始的不具引號識別項。

trans-unit.source: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the ODBC driver, calling SQLGetInfo(SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR).
trans-unit.target: 連接傳遞時，會導致 managed 包裝函式呼叫 SQLGetInfo(SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR) 的 ODBC 驅動程式從取得的引號字元。

trans-unit.source: When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix*> and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix*>.
trans-unit.target: 沒有連接傳遞時，字串已加上引號使用來自<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 引號識別項的版本。

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的引號識別碼內的正確逸出。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 指定引號識別項傳回的不具引號的正確格式，該識別項，包括正確任何內嵌引號識別項中。

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: 會將移除其內嵌的引號識別項。

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly unescaped.
trans-unit.target: 不具引號的識別碼，與內嵌引號正確未逸出方式。

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 指定引號識別項傳回的不具引號的正確格式，該識別項，包括正確任何內嵌引號識別項中。

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: 會將移除其內嵌的引號識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly unescaped.
trans-unit.target: 不具引號的識別碼，與內嵌引號正確未逸出方式。
